comprehensive_overview: aflow is a computational software package for first-principles calculations and high-throughput materials science. It enables researchers to study materials properties, electronic structure, and phase stability using density functional theory (DFT) calculations.
core_features: Some core features of aflow include: 1. High-throughput screening of materials properties, 2. Prediction of phase stability and electronic structure, 3. Automated workflows for DFT calculations, 4. Database integration for materials discovery and design.
